description: This dataset contains listings of used cars, with various attributes that describe each car.
target_variable_description: The price of the used cars, measured in lakhs.

features.name: Name
features.description: The make and model of the car.

features.name: Location
features.description: The location or city where the car is sold.

features.name: Year
features.description: The year the car was manufactured.

features.name: Mileage
features.description: The mileage of the car, indicating fuel efficiency.

features.name: Kilometers_Driven
features.description: The total kilometers driven by the car, as shown by the odometer.

features.name: Fuel_Type
features.description: The type of fuel the car uses (petrol or diesel).

features.name: Transmission
features.description: The type of transmission of the car (manual or automatic).

features.name: Owner_Type
features.description: The number of previous owners of the car.

features.name: Engine
features.description: The displacement of the car's engine, typically in cc (cubic centimeters).

features.name: Power
features.description: The horsepower output of the car's engine.

features.name: Seats
features.description: The number of seats in the car.

features.name: New_Price
features.description: The price of the car when it was new, measured in lakhs.

row_description: Each row represents a specific used car listing.
column_description: Each column represents a particular attribute or feature of the cars.
